text: Snakehead is the seventh novel in the Alex Rider series, written by British author Anthony Horowitz. In this novel, the teenaged MI6 agent, Alex Rider, crash-lands off the coast of Australia. The Australian Secret Service hires him to get into one of the ruthless gangs operating across Southeast Asia, known as snakeheads. These gangs smuggle drugs, weapons, and people. ==References== Category:Novels Category:Anthony Horowitz
title: Snakehead (novel)
